text: Stephanie Venier (born 19 December 1993) is an Austrian World Cup alpine ski racer, and specializes in the speed events of downhill and super-G. Born in Innsbruck, Tyrol, Venier made her World Cup debut at age 19 in January 2013. She gained her first podium in January 2017 in a super-G at Garmisch, Germany; several weeks later at the World Championships, she won the silver medal in the downhill. ==World Cup results== ===Season standings=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !Season !!
